name: Joey and Penguin's 2 Player Adventure
storyline: There are many co-op games out there that expand upon a single player experience to allow for more fun. But there are few that are built from the ground up as a cooperative experience. From day one, Joey and Penguin's goal was to create a challenging adventure where players had to work together to succeed. Overcoming a challenge alone is great, but overcoming a challenge with a teammate is a triumph!
summary: Penguin the penguin has been framed for a crime and Joey the monkey is determined to prove his innocence. In this top-down action adventure, 2 players must toss a water balloon back and forth to knock out foes and collect items as they journey ever closer to the truth.
